text: Umesh Malik is an Indian politician. He belongs to the Bharatiya Janata Party. He is a member of the Seventeenth Legislative Assembly of Uttar Pradesh representing the Budhana assembly constituency. , he is 51 years old and a graduate. ==Political career== Umesh Malik has been a member of the 17th Legislative Assembly of Uttar Pradesh. Since 2017, he has represented the Budhana constituency and is a member of the Bhartiya Janata Party. he defeating Samajwadi Party candidate Pramod Tyagi by a margin of 13,201 votes. ==Posts held== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! # !!
